roleset.name: to secure of fasten with a tape
roleset.note: TAPE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls tape-22.4. (from tape.01-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: So Mr. Barrett , then vice president of the Alabama Steamship Association , took a steel-toothed garden rake and taped it to the underside of a leaf rake about nine inches up .
example.arg: Mr. Barrett , then vice president of the Alabama Steamship Association ,
to the underside of a leaf rake about nine inches up

roleset.name: to record on magnetic tape
roleset.note: TAPE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls transcribe-25.4. (from tape.02-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Ms. Moss said [0] Ms. Levine secretly taped many conversations with her bosses at the Odeon in which they told her [0]she was being fired as maitre 'd because she was pregnant [*T*-1] .
example.arg: many conversations with her bosses at the Odeon in which they told her [0] she was being fired as maitre 'd because she was pregnant [*T*-1]

roleset.name: affix with tape, completive
roleset.note: TAPE_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls. (from tape.03-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: I taped up his foot with gauze and it is STILL bleeding.
